about.description:
Go is expressive, concise, clean, and efficient. Its concurrency mechanisms
make it easy to write programs that get the most out of multicore and
networked machines, while its novel type system enables flexible and
modular program construction. Go compiles quickly to machine code yet has
the convenience of garbage collection and the power of run-time reflection.
It's a fast, statically typed, compiled language that feels like a
dynamically typed, interpreted language.

name: go_linux-64
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.10.9
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: go_linux-64
    version: 1.10.3
source:
    -   folder: go
        sha256: 567b1cc66c9704d1c019c50bef946272e911ec6baf244310f87f4e678be155f2
        url: https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.10.3.src.tar.gz
    -   folder: go-bootstrap
        sha256: 49f806f66762077861b7de7081f586995940772d29d4c45068c134441a743fa2
        url: https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.4-bootstrap-20170531.tar.gz
build:
    binary_relocation: false
    detect_binary_files_with_prefix: false
    force_ignore_keys:
        - c_compiler
        - cxx_compiler
    noarch: false
    number: '2'
    script: build-platform.bat
    string: h0f5337a_2
requirements:
    build:
        - m2-bash 4.3.042 5
        - m2-file 5.25 2
        - m2-gcc-libs 5.3.0 4
        - m2-grep 2.22 4
        - m2-libiconv 1.14 3
        - m2-libintl 0.19.7 4
        - m2-libpcre 8.38 2
        - m2-msys2-runtime 2.5.0.17080.65c939c 3
        - m2-sed 4.2.2 3
        - m2-zlib 1.2.8 4
        - msys2-conda-epoch 20160418 1
    host:
        - go-core 1.10.3 h41a7c8f_2
    run:
        - go-core 1.10.3 h41a7c8f_2
test:
    commands:
        - go env
        - go build hello.go
        - for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %%a in (`go env GOEXE`) do file hello%%a | grep
            'ELF'
    files:
        - hello.go
    requires:
        - posix
about:
    description: 'Go is expressive, concise, clean, and efficient. Its concurrency
        mechanisms

        make it easy to write programs that get the most out of multicore and

        networked machines, while its novel type system enables flexible and

        modular program construction. Go compiles quickly to machine code yet has

        the convenience of garbage collection and the power of run-time reflection.

        It''s a fast, statically typed, compiled language that feels like a

        dynamically typed, interpreted language.

        '
    dev_url: https://go.googlesource.com/go
    doc_url: https://golang.org/doc
    home: http://golang.org
    license: BSD-Style
    license_family: BSD
    license_file: go/LICENSE
    summary: The Go Programming Language
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - nehaljwani
        - scopatz
        - sodre

Go is expressive, concise, clean, and efficient. Its concurrency mechanisms

commands: for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %%a in (`go env GOEXE`) do file hello%%a | grep 'ELF'
